inlineContent.text: A binding to a Boolean value that you can set to
to show a sheet with subscription offers for Apple Music.
Options to use for loading the subscription offer for
Apple Music.
The function to call upon completing the initial
loading process for this subscription offer. The subscription
offer UI becomes visible when it calls this function with the
error argument as
. If there is an error in the
loading process, the subscription offer calls this function with
a non-
error, and it resets the
binding
to
The example below displays a simple button that the user can activate
to begin presenting subscription offers for Apple Music. The action
handler of this button initiates the presentation of those offers
by setting the
variable to
You can also configure the Apple Music subscription offer by
creating an instance of
, setting
relevant properties on it, and passing it to
For example, to present contextual offers that highlight a specific
album, you can configure the subscription offer like the following:
The initial value of
includes relevant tokens
(affiliate and campaign tokens) that allow you to receive compensation
for referring new Apple Music subscribers. For more information,
see this presentation of the
You may also set
to
to programmatically
dismiss the subscription offer (or to abort its loading process).

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
A property wrapper type that can read and write a value owned by a source of
truth.
A type that represents part of your app’s user interface and provides
modifiers that you use to configure views.
Presents a StoreKit overlay when a given condition is true.
Declares the view as dependent on the entitlement of an In-App Purchase product, and returns a
modified view.
Add a function to call before initiating a purchase from StoreKit view within this view, providing a set
of options for the purchase.
Initiates the process of presenting a sheet with subscription offers
for Apple Music when the
binding is
Presents a sheet that enables users to redeem subscription offer
codes that you configure in App Store Connect.
Add an action to perform when a purchase initiated from a StoreKit view within this view completes.
Add an action to perform when a user triggers the purchase button on a StoreKit view within this
view.
Configure the visibility of labels displaying an in-app purchase product description within the view.
Adds a standard border to an in-app purchase product’s icon .
Sets the style for In-App Purchase product views within a view.
Display the refund request sheet for the given transaction.
Specifies the visibility of auxiliary buttons that store view and subscription store view instances may use.
Declares the view as dependent on an In-App Purchase product and returns a modified view.
Declares the view as dependent on a collection of In-App Purchase products and returns a
modified view.
A type for grouping other types for showing subscription offers for Apple Music.
Options for loading subscription offers for Apple Music.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
